title: Repeat alarm turns off for future when I swipe right or dismiss with volume buttons
content:
My alarm turns completely off for all future repeats when I swipe right or use the volume buttons to turn off the alarm currently going off.  It says "Alarm Off."  I then miss the alarm the following day because it is no longer active. I have to go into the app and turn it back on for it to work the next day. It makes choosing repeat useless.
I do have volume keys set to 'Dismiss.'
How do I set my phone so I can dismiss rather than completely turn off the alarm for the entire week?
category: Setting up and Personalizing your Device, Google Pixel 4a
